title: @RIOT Missing Mastery 6 Token
body: I received an S- today when i played Kled, and I also achieved mastery 5 with him that game. The client said i had received a mastery 6 token for Kled but It's missing from my "materials". I would like my mastery token please!

replies.body:
The message you get when you hit mastery level 5 is intended to let you know that you can *now* start earning mastery tokens by earning S-ranks when playing that champion. It's not possible to hit level 5 *and* earn a mastery token, though.

I hope this clears up the confusion, let me know if you have any questions.
Yeah I finally found another discussion about the same thing with this same answer. thanks!

I have the same problem too. I just had an S- and I'm already Master 5 as Akali but I didn't get a token. I hope you guys can check the match history I didn't take a screen shot of the S- notification
